title: PBE acc
body: So my friend created a PBE acc using my acc.I changed the password on that acc but i was 2 late.He created a PBE acc to himself with my lol profile.How can i get that PBE acc back?

replies.body: Hey, reach out to our account team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and let them know what happened.  We can look into this for you and recovering the account.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!

The account is linked to your main account, so I'm guessing it's also linked to your email as well. Have you tried recovering it with the "Forgotten Password?". From there on you should be able to get it back.
